body: Rejoice fellow perverts! For the goddess of uncensorship has smiled upon us once again!

Went right to hentai without reading/watching the manga/anime. Makes me wonder what the mark on the lieutenant is? But that for another time. Back to the manga, that was one of the hottest three combo blonde sex. Loved it.
Wow awesome!! It is rare to see coloured doujinshi. By the way i would like riza hawkeye and roy mustang doujinshi in the future.
Yo! I read this a long time ago, but it was censored. Now it's colored and uncensored. This is a good time to be alive.
